sen.j: 船王（ふねのおう、生没年不詳）は、奈良時代の皇族。
sen.e: Prince Fune (dates of birth and death unknown) is of the imperial family during the Nara era.
The Prince Fune (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Imperial Family during the Nara period.
sen.cmt: the, a member を補いました。カッコ内を修正しました。is→was,imperial family→Imperial Family,era→period と修正しました。
sen.e: The Prince Fune (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Imperial Family during the Nara period.

sen.j: 父は舎人親王（天武天皇の皇子）。
sen.e: His father was the Imperial Prince Toneri (prince of Emperor Temmu)
His father was the Imperial Prince Toneri (the prince of Emperor Temmu).
sen.cmt: the, ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: His father was the Imperial Prince Toneri (the prince of Emperor Temmu).

sen.j: 兄に三原王、弟に淳仁天皇がいる。
sen.e: His older brother was Mihara no Okimi and his younger brother was Emperor Junnin.
His older brother was Mihara no Okimi and his younger brother was the Emperor Junnin.
His older brother was Mihara no Okimi and his younger brother was the Emperor Junnin.

sen.j: 757年（天平宝字元年）7月の橘奈良麻呂の乱においては、謀反に加担した者を拷問、道祖王、黄文王、大伴古麻呂らを死に追い込んでいる。
sen.e: At the time of the revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro in July 757, he tortured those involved in the revolt and drove Prince Funado, Prince Kibumi and OTOMO no Komaro to death.
At the revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro in July 757, he tortured those involved in the revolt and drove the Prince Funado, the Prince Kibumi and OTOMO no Komaro to death.
sen.cmt: the を補いました。the time of を削除しました。
sen.e: At the revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro in July 757, he tortured those involved in the revolt and drove the Prince Funado, the Prince Kibumi and OTOMO no Komaro to death.

sen.j: 759年（天平宝字3年）親王宣下を受ける。
sen.e: He was given the title of the Imperial Prince in 759.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He was given the imperial proclamation to become an imperial prince in 759.
sen.cmt: 文脈に応じて修正しました。
sen.e: He was given the imperial proclamation to become an imperial prince in 759.

sen.j: 764年（天平宝字8年）藤原仲麻呂の乱で連座の罪に問われ、壱岐国に配流となった。
sen.e: He was accused of complicity in the revolt of FUJIWARA no Nakamaro and was exiled to Iki in 764.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He was accused of complicity in the revolt of FUJIWARA no Nakamaro and was exiled to Iki Province in 764.
sen.cmt: スペースを修正しました。Provence を補いました。
sen.e: He was accused of complicity in the revolt of FUJIWARA no Nakamaro and was exiled to Iki Province in 764.
